description.en: PreMiD adds Discord Rich Presence support to a lot of services you use and love.
description.nl: PreMiD voegt ondersteuning voor Discord Rich Presence toe aan veel services die u gebruikt en waar u van houdt.
description.ga_IE: Cuireann PreMiD tacaíocht Discord Rich Presence ar fáil do go leor seirbhísí a úsáideann tú agus a bhfuil grá agat dóibh.
description.de: PreMiD ergänzt viele Dienste, die du nutzt und liebst, um die Unterstützung von Discord Rich Presence.
description.fr: PreMiD ajoute le support de Discord Rich Presence à de nombreux services que vous utilisez et aimez.
description.tr: PreMiD, kullandığınız internet servisleri için Discord profilinize Rich Presence bilgisi ekler.
description.vi_VN: PreMiD thêm hỗ trợ Discord Rich Presence cho các dịch vụ bạn yêu thích và sử dụng.
description.ko_KR: PreMiD는 당신이 사용하고 좋아하는 많은 서비스에 Discord Rich Presence 지원을 추가시킵니다.
